title: Palindrome Permutation
statement: Given a string, write a function to check if it is a permutation of a palindrome. A palindrome is a word or phrase that is the same forwards and backwards. A permutation is a rearrangement of letters. The palindrome does not need to be limited to just dictionary words.

hints.#106: You do not have to-and should not-generate all permutations. This would be very inefficient.

hints.#121: What characteristics would a string that is a permutation of a palindrome have?

hints.#134: Have you tried a hash table? You should be able to get this down to 0(N) time.

hints.#136: Can you reduce the space usage by using a bit vector?

tests.explanation: A single character is a palindrome.
Two of the same character is a palindrome
Any number of the same character is a palindrome
Two different characters cannot be a palindrome
